column1: [[Helge Fauskanger]] has suggested that Tolkien's manuscript note "''cundo'' 'lord'"<ref name=PE17>{{PE
column2: 17}}, p. 117</ref> is a related gloss, also in [[Quenya]]. The latter form conforms to the orthography used in ''[[The Lord of the Rings]]'' (where Tolkien represented the [k]-sound with the letter "c").<ref>{{webcite
